frontmatter.title: Configure TypeScript, ESLint, Prettier on VSCode to Develop React Native
frontmatter.spoiler: I used TypeScript to develop my latest React Native project. And it’s been a joyful journey. Type system brings more    benefits than expected. It took me sometime to configure VS Code to lint and format TypeScript codes properly. So I’d like to share my configuration, and hope it can be helpful to others。
